text: though the one original touch) in the film, which is better-than-average glossy comedy, Hollywood-styled, European set. Most of it has been shot in and around the sun-terrace of the Hotel Splendido (renamed the Dolce Vista for the picture) in Portofino and if there's a better view to be had from a more comfortable vantage point anywhere, I'd like to see it.
